name: Material Dark Facebook
description:
A Material Dark Theme for Facebook. Based on VSCode/Jetbrains Material theme.

IMPORTANT

  • - You must have "new" Facebook enabled. (See how)
  • - You need to activate "Dark mode" (See link just above)
  • - Doesn't work on messenger currently
Github Repo This theme is SUPER easy to customize ; you just need to change hue and/or saturation to get your own dark nuance. Custom accent doesn't work everywhere for now. You can uncomment to test it but it won't apply everywhere. If your eyes like it, I did the same on some other well-known websites with the same theme: https://userstyles.org/users/763420
